bibl.title: Divine Mothers: The Influence of Isis on the Virgin Mary in Egyptian Lactans-Iconography. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Introduction. - The evidence collected by Tran Tam Tinh. - A matter of approach: egyptologists vs. mariologists. - Discussion: towards a more complex view.

bibl.title: Journal of the Canadian Society for Coptic Studies / Journal de la société canadienne pour les études coptes

bibl.seg: Higgins Sabrina, Divine Mothers: The Influence of Isis on the Virgin Mary in Egyptian Lactans-Iconography. Avec résumé en anglais.
Journal of the Canadian Society for Coptic Studies / Journal de la société canadienne pour les études coptes 3-4 (2012) pp. 71-90, 12 figg.
Introduction. - The evidence collected by Tran Tam Tinh. - A matter of approach: egyptologists vs. mariologists. - Discussion: towards a more complex view.
